src_text: Hi Musumbhunuku, Sara Danius, matsalana wa nkarhi hinkwawo wa Komiti ya Nobel eka Matsalwa le Swedish Academy, u tivise erivaleni eka nongonoko wa xiyanimoya eka Sveriges Radio le Sweden a vula leswaku komiti, tanihi leswi a yi nga swi koti ku fikelela Bob Dylan hi ku kongoma malunghana ni ku hlula kakwe Sagwadi ra Nobel eka Matsalwa hi 2016, yi tshikile matshalatshala lawa a yi ma endla yo n’wi kuma.
ref_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Tsonga]: Eka malembe xidzana lama hundzeke, vanhu va tirhise vukheta ku endla mapatu eka tindhawu to kwaza, kuya eka switshunga swale lwandle.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Tsonga]: 800 wa timayili ta Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ti pfariwile endzhaku ka ku halaka ka magidi ya tibarele ta oyili edzongeni wa Fairbanks, le Alaska.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Tsonga]: Swiphemu swa Belgium ya namuntlha a ku ri xiphemu xa Luxembourg hi nkarhi lowu hundzeke kambe yi xiphemu xa Belgium endzhaku ka Nhlunga-vuhosi wa le Belgium was 1830.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Tsonga]: Ku sukela loko yi sunguriwile, The Onion yi hundzuke nhlangano lowukulu lowu encenyetaka mahungu, yi ni nkandziyiso lowu printiwaka, yi ni webusayiti leyi kokeke rinoko ra vanhu va 5,000,000 hi n’hweti ya October, leyi vanhu va navetisaka eka yona, yi ni xitichi xa mahungu lexi tlangaka tiawara ta 24, yi ni tipodcasts ni atlas ya misava leyi ya ha ku humesiwaka leyi vuriwaka Our Dumb World.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Tsonga]: Eka malembe xidzana lama hundzeke, vanhu va tirhise vukheta ku endla mapatu eka tindhawu to kwaza, kuya eka switshunga swale lwandle.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Tsonga]: 800 wa timayili ta Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ti pfariwile endzhaku ka ku halaka ka magidi ya tibarele ta oyili edzongeni wa Fairbanks, le Alaska.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Tsonga]: Swiphemu swa Belgium ya namuntlha a ku ri xiphemu xa Luxembourg hi nkarhi lowu hundzeke kambe yi xiphemu xa Belgium endzhaku ka Nhlunga-vuhosi wa le Belgium was 1830.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Tsonga]: Ku sukela loko yi sunguriwile, The Onion yi hundzuke nhlangano lowukulu lowu encenyetaka mahungu, yi ni nkandziyiso lowu printiwaka, yi ni webusayiti leyi kokeke rinoko ra vanhu va 5,000,000 hi n’hweti ya October, leyi vanhu va navetisaka eka yona, yi ni xitichi xa mahungu lexi tlangaka tiawara ta 24, yi ni tipodcasts ni atlas ya misava leyi ya ha ku humesiwaka leyi vuriwaka Our Dumb World.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
Translate the following sentence from Tsonga to English
[Tsonga]: Ku tirhisana kahle entirhweni i swa nkoka ngopfu, ku tiyisekisa leswaku ku bumabumeriwa matshalatshala ya ntlawa ku ri na ku bumabumeriwa ka munhu hi wexe.
[English]:

src_text: Vatirhi va fanele va tshama va kuma ku tlangeriwa hi valawuri va vona eka xiboho xin’wana ni xin’wana lexi va xi tekaka, naswona ku languteriwe leswaku va yingisela swileriso swa valawuri handle ko kanakana.
ref_text: Workers must often get their superiors' approval for any decisions they make, and are expected to obey their superiors' instructions without question.
hyp_text: The perpetrators are likely to be local residents who know the area well, and who will have no trouble hiding their involvement in the crime.
